body:
### Steps to reproduce

spack  -d install gmsh@4.8.4 %gcc@10.2.0  ^flex@2.6.4

### Error message

==> [2021-11-15-14:01:55.800065] gmsh: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> [2021-11-15-14:01:59.962838] gmsh: Executing phase: 'build'
==> [2021-11-15-14:08:34.732588] Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'

* **Spack:** 0.16.1
* **Python:** 2.7.5

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform

title: error "undefined reference to `XGetUtf8FontAndGlyph'" while installing gmsh
